reason: Bitcoin ETF outflows indicate significant institutional selling pressure, eroding recent gains and dampening market optimism. Concurrently, a major hack resulting in a token's near-total collapse highlights critical smart contract vulnerabilities and adds to overall market FUD, increasing systemic risk perception. The combination suggests a period of price weakness and elevated volatility.
headlines: A ruble stablecoin outpaced market leaders last year despite international sanctions
Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink stakes $170M ETH on Linea network
Bitcoin ETF optimism fades as three-day outflows streak erases early-month gains
Builders behind popular Zcash wallet Zashi to launch new startup 'cashZ'
Truebit token crashes 99.9% after hacker drains $26.6 million in ether
